text: Helmut Giesbrecht (February 18, 1943 â€“ October 9, 2020) was a Ukrainian-born Canadian educator and politician. He represented Skeena in the Legislative Assembly of British Columbia from 1991 to 2001 as a New Democratic Party (NDP) member. From 1981 to 1985, he was Mayor of Terrace, British Columbia. Giesbrecht died on October 9, 2020, aged 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian school teachers Category:Trade unionists Category:Politicians from British Columbia
title: Helmut Giesbrecht
